title: Meta Uses Open Source AI To Design Greener Concrete For Its Next Data Center
description:
BrianFagioli writes: Meta has partnered with Amrize and the University of Illinois to develop an "AI-optimized" concrete mix that cuts carbon by 35% for its new data center.






Read more of this story at Slashdot.

author: msmash
title: Meta Beats Copyright Suit From Authors Over AI Training on Books
description:
An anonymous reader shares a report: Meta escaped a first-of-its-kind copyright lawsuit from a group of authors who alleged the tech giant hoovered up millions of copyrighted books without permission to train its generative AI model called Llama.

author: Tim Hardwick
title: WhatsApp Now Summarizes Your Unread Messages Using AI

author: Effie Webb,Shubhangi Goel
title: Leaked docs reveal Meta is training its chatbots to message you first, remember your chats, and keep you talking
description: Leaked guidelines show how Meta's custom AI chatbots are trained to get more proactive, following up with users to increase retention.
content:

author: Lee Chong Ming
title: A judge just handed Meta a big AI copyright victory. He said lawyers for the other side fumbled the case.
description: The judge said that one "potentially winning argument" — that AI tools could harm the market for human-created content — was barely mentioned.
content:
A California federal judge on Wednesday dismissed most of a lawsuit brought by a group of authors who accused Meta of using their copyrighted books to train its AI models.Chesnot/Getty Images
